name: Michal Koucký 0001
content: Home page of Michal Koucký About Research Teaching Other Home page of Michal Koucký I am a member of the Computer Science Institute of Charles University in Prague which is a part of the Faculty of Mathematics and Physics. I am interested in theoretical computer science, especially in computational complexity, data structures, algorithms, and combinatorics. My past large projects are here: EPAC project supported by GA CR, and LBCAD project funded by ERC. List of my publications is here. T.
